title: RunBoyRun Manifesto
subtitle: A movement, a mindset, a mission.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: RunBoyRun is a living experience platform for creative developers. We're shaping the future of development experience by combining human creativity with AI.
items: Code is your language, platform is your stage
Every line of code tells a story
AI is not an assistant, but a partner

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To redefine the developer experience and create an AI-powered development culture.

values.title: Values
values.description: RunBoyRun's core values shape every decision and action we take.

principles.title: Principles
principles.description: These principles define RunBoyRun's methodology of working and creating.
items: Think with AI, create like human
